content.question: The banding patterns of the DNA fragments reveal that

choices.label: child 1 and child 2 cannot be biological siblings
child 1 and child 3 probably look like the mother
the mother cannot be the biological parent of all three children
the mother’s DNA has the same DNA sequence as the father’s DNA
child 2 and child 3 inherited all of their DNA from the father

content.answer: the mother cannot be the biological parent of all three children

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
